title: Karen Armstrong FRSL is a British author and commentator known for her books on comparative religion. A former Roman Catholic religious sister, she went from a conservative to a more liberal and mystical Christian faith.
author: Karen Armstrong

title: Eckhart Tolle is a German-born resident of Canada, best known as the author of The Power of Now and A New Earth. In 2011, he was listed by the Watkins Review as the most spiritually influential person in the world.
author: Echart Tolly

title: Alan Wilson Watts was a British-born philosopher, writer, and speaker, best known as an interpreter and populariser of Eastern philosophy for a Western audience.
author: Alan Watts

title: Clinton Richard Dawkins, Sc. D., FRS, FRSL is a British ethologist, evolutionary biologist, and author.
author: Richard Dawkins
